thread.title: LeGarrette Blount sums up Tom Brady perfectly — and explicitly
thread.title_full: LeGarrette Blount sums up Tom Brady perfectly — and explicitly

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: LeGarrette Blount sums up Tom Brady perfectly — and explicitly
text:
LeGarrette Blount sums up Tom Brady perfectly — and explicitly Who can disagree? Post to Facebook LeGarrette Blount sums up Tom Brady perfectly — and explicitly Who can disagree?  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/legarrette-blount-tom-brady-bill-belichick-patriots-super-bowl-51-fox/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   LeGarrette Blount sums up Tom Brady perfectly — and explicitly Adi Joseph , USA TODAY Sports 10:53 p.m. ET Feb. 5, 2017 
Tom Brady and LeGarrette Blount celebrate the Patriots' comeback in Super Bowl 51. (Photo: Matthew Emmons-USA TODAY Sports) 
LeGarrette Blount wasn't the Patriots running back doing the memorable stuff during Super Bowl 51. But while James White stole the show, Blount took over the postgame. 
On the field after the 34-28 overtime victory against the Falcons, Blount grabbed hold of his head coach and his quarterback. 
To Bill Belichick, the NFL's first five-time Super Bowl-winning coach: "You're the greatest." 
To Tom Brady, the NFL's first five-time Super Bowl-winning quarterback: the same, with a NSFW twist. 
Here's the video: — Keith Britton (@KeithBritton86) February 6, 2017 
Frankly, after watching that comeback, we can't disagree. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/legarrette-blount-tom-brady-bill-belichick-patriots-super-bowl-51-fox/ Most Popular
